answers.answer: I would mention this to your doctor. There are orthostatic hypotension disorders that can cause this. You may want to ask for a referal to a neurologist - as they are the ones who deal with that. RA can cause this, so can diabetes and auto-immune disorders as well as a simple vitamin deficiency or being dehydrated.
